expo.name: FridgeWise
expo.description: AI-powered food recognition and recipe generation app that helps you manage your fridge inventory and discover delicious recipes based on available ingredients

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FridgeWise needs camera access to scan and identify ingredients from your fridge for recipe suggestions
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FridgeWise needs photo library access to select ingredient images for analysis and recipe generation
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: FridgeWise may save generated recipes and ingredient photos to your photo library
